title: Phaser.io Game
description: Utilizing the Phaser.io JavaScript library, I have created a fully functional "SHMUP" style game, that increases with difficulty over time. Try to last as long as you can!

title: Api Project
description: Using Javascript, Jquery, Charts.js, HTML, and Sass I have built an application that will acquire statistical information about a user's demographic based on user inputs.

title: PSD Conversion
description: Using HTML, CSS, Sass, and Javascript, I have perfectly converted this PSD to a single page responsive website.
